``` {r echo=FALSE, message=FALSE}
library(plotly)
library(dplyr)
View(mtcars)

mtcars <- tibble::rownames_to_column(mtcars)

plot_ly(mtcars, x = ~VALUE, y = ~mpg, type = 'scatter') %>%
      layout(title = 'Various Cars and their MPGs',
             xaxis = list(title = 'Car Models'),
             yaxis = list(title = 'MPGs'))


```
